summary: On Tuesday 4th June the GWS public web access server will be moved to a new platform.

updates.details: Downtime should be minimal, but the service should be considered ‘at risk’ on this date.
Maintenance scheduled from 12:00 on Tues 4 June for ~24 hrs.
Scheduled reboot at 10:00 to clear storage issues.

summary: Faulty network switch, some hosts unavailable.

updates.details: Hosts host419 - host458 currently unavailable: these make up a large part of the par-multi queue but also used in par-single and other queues. Sci8 also affected. Investigations ongoing.
